text: Bergakker is a village in the Dutch province of Gelderland. It is a part of the municipality of Tiel, and lies about 2 km west of Tiel. The statistical area "Bergakker", which also can include the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 380.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005. As of 1 January 2005. Bergakker is known for the Bergakker sword sheath, which was found in a field in 1996. ==References== Category:Populated places in Gelderland Category:Tiel
title: Bergakker
